The video was created by Tom Coben: a VFX artist, who also created other digital creations such as the "Bowlbot 5000" and the "Footbot 7000."
Coben posted the video of the: Batbot 6000" on Instagram in July 2019, accompanied by hashtags that identified it as a digital creation, such as #3drendering, #animation, and #CGI.
Coben provided a behind: the-scenes look at the making of the "Batbot 6000" video, further confirming its digital nature.
The expert mentions that Coben: s previous digital creations, including the "Bowlbot 5000," have fooled social media users before, indicating a pattern of creating realistic but entirely digital robots.
